name: padel_availability
description: ## How to install - install virtualenv `pip3 install virtualenv --break-system-packages` - create envrionment `python3 -m venv env` - activate envrionment `source env/bin/activate`     - you should now see a "(env)" in your command line     - for later deactivating the environment run `deactivate` - install dependencies `pip3 install -r requirements.txt`
